content: This is whack. I love Elon Musk, and I know​ he’s done a ton of amazing things and has been highly successful, but I don’t think this is what the research says. People seem to have this false idea that you can’t incentivize creativity and thinking but you can. Yea you can’t do it in a broad abstract way like offering bonuses for the best ideas and results, but you CAN find a process that leads to creative results and incentivized that process. Basically you can indirectly incentivize creativity and thinking by encouraging the process.
